customize.text: Rerir is one of the six people who should have prevented the disaster and stopped the Vinster King from continuing to rock the foundation of the world. He, along with four of them, couldn't resist the call of the Abyss, and divided among themselves a power that could destroy the world. He became a Sinner, a transcendent being with a world-shattering power.

customize.name: Moon Goddesses
customize.desc: Aria, Sonnet, and Canon — three sisters and Moon Goddesses who once ruled the firmament. The war with the Second Throne led to the sisters' death.

customize.text: Rerir is fixated on the Moons. It is believed that after the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text:
, he fell into the "moon's reflection," from which there can be no return.
The Wild Hunt
Rerir's body was once torn into countless pieces and hurled into the swirling chaos of time itself. But even so, his life and will were not extinguished. His remains became the reason for The Wild Hunt's attacks. To become stronger and get his body back, Rerir tries to find all his remains.

customize.name: Flins
customize.desc: A Lightkeeper of Nod-Krai, guardian of a lighthouse and graveyard on a northern isle. An enigmatic gentleman, cultured and courtly.

customize.text:
One day, Flins discovered strange crystals and placed them into his lantern. It turned out that these crystals were Rerir's heart, so the Sinner began to hunt them. Thanks to the help of the Traveler, the heart was cleansed of the power of the Abyss and destroyed.
In addition, Rerir took on the form of Flins to kill the Lightkeepers' Sergeant Major Sousi.

customize.name: Twin
customize.desc: The Traveler's twin, Princess/Prince of Khaenri'ah, Savior, and the Princess/Prince of the Abyss Order.

customize.text: Rerir took the form of the Traveler's twin to trick them into stealing the Moon Marrow, the remains of the Eternal Moon.

customize.name: Kuuvahki
customize.desc: Kuuvahki is a type of native Nod-Krai magnetism-like energy, polarized not by positive and negative, but by red and blue.

customize.text: The power of the Kuuvahki is the opposite of the power of the Abyss, and when they meet, the stronger one suppresses the weaker one. Rerir was able to absorb the kuuvahki from the earth and the cannon designed to destroy The Wild Hunt to become stronger and gain a body.
